00039 AEGfxVertexList* createMesh(float width, float height);

00045 /*************************************************************************/
00068 /*************************************************************************/
00069 AEGfxVertexList* createMesh(float width, float height, float offsetX, float offsetY, float Rotation)
00070 {
00071         float halfWidth = width / 2;
00072         float halfHeight = height / 2;
00073 
00074         double len = sqrt(halfWidth*halfWidth + halfHeight*halfHeight);
00075 
00076         // Informing the library that we're about to start adding triangles
00077         AEGfxMeshStart();
00078 
00079         // 1 triangle at a time
00080         // X, Y, Color, texU, texV
00081         AEGfxTriAdd(
00082                 len * cos(atan2(halfHeight,halfWidth) + PI + Rotation), len * sin(atan2(halfHeight,halfWidth) + PI + Rotation),         0x00FFFFFF, 0.0f, offsetY, 
00083                 len * cos(atan2(-halfHeight,halfWidth) + Rotation),             len * sin(atan2(-halfHeight,halfWidth) + Rotation),                     0x00FFFFFF, offsetX, offsetY,
00084                 len * cos(atan2(halfHeight,-halfWidth) + Rotation),             len * sin(atan2(halfHeight,-halfWidth) + Rotation),                     0x00FFFFFF, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00085         AEGfxTriAdd(
00086                 len * cos(atan2(-halfHeight,halfWidth) + Rotation),             len * sin(atan2(-halfHeight,halfWidth) + Rotation),                     0x00FFFFFF, offsetX, offsetY, 
00087                 len * cos(atan2(halfHeight,halfWidth) + Rotation),              len * sin(atan2(halfHeight,halfWidth) + Rotation),                      0x00FFFFFF, offsetX, 0.0f,
00088                 len * cos(atan2(halfHeight,-halfWidth) + Rotation),             len * sin(atan2(halfHeight,-halfWidth) + Rotation),                     0x00FFFFFF, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00089 
00090         //Returns the mesh
00091         return AEGfxMeshEnd();
00092 }

00094 /*************************************************************************/
00123 /*************************************************************************/
00124 Sprite* CreateSprite(char SpriteName[], char* texture, float width, float height, unsigned short ZIndex, int xFrames, int yFrames)
00125 {       
00126         //Adds the sprite to the object manager list
00127         Sprite *CurrentSprite = AddObject();
00128 
00129         //Animation offset if needed
00130         CurrentSprite->OffsetX = 1.0f / xFrames;
00131         CurrentSprite->OffsetY = 1.0f / yFrames;
00132 
00133         //Rotation default to 0
00134         CurrentSprite->Rotation = 0.0f;
00135         CurrentSprite->RotationPrev = 0.0f;
00136 
00137         //Sprite Graphics Properties
00138         CurrentSprite->SpriteMesh = createMesh(width, height, CurrentSprite->OffsetX, CurrentSprite->OffsetY, CurrentSprite->Rotation);
00139         CurrentSprite->SpriteTexture = AEGfxTextureLoad(texture);
00140 
00141         // Size of the sprite
00142         CurrentSprite->Width = width;
00143         CurrentSprite->Height = height;
00144 
00145         //Position of the sprite
00146         CurrentSprite->Position.x = 0.0f;
00147         CurrentSprite->Position.y = 0.0f;
00148         CurrentSprite->ZIndex     = ZIndex;
00149 
00150         //Animation Properties
00151         CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame = 0;
00152         CurrentSprite->TotalFrames = xFrames * yFrames;
00153         if(CurrentSprite->TotalFrames > 1)
00154                 CurrentSprite->AnimationActive = 1;
00155         else
00156                 CurrentSprite->AnimationActive = 0;
00157         CurrentSprite->AnimationSpeed = 12;
00158         CurrentSprite->AnimationTimer = 0;
00159 
00160         //Texture Properties
00161         strcpy(CurrentSprite->TextureName, texture);
00162         CurrentSprite->NumHeightFrames = yFrames;
00163         CurrentSprite->NumWidthFrames = xFrames;
00164 
00165         CurrentSprite->Alpha = 1.0f;
00166         CurrentSprite->Visible = 1;
00167         CurrentSprite->FlipX = 0;
00168         CurrentSprite->FlipY = 0;
00169         CurrentSprite->FlipXPrev = 0;
00170         CurrentSprite->FlipYPrev = 0;
00171 
00172         //Collision properties
00173         CurrentSprite->CanCollide     = 1;
00174         CurrentSprite->Ghost          = 1;
00175         CurrentSprite->SensorType     = RectangleCollider;
00176         CurrentSprite->CollideSize.x  = CurrentSprite->Width;
00177         CurrentSprite->CollideSize.y  = CurrentSprite->Height;
00178 
00179         //The sprite has now been created
00180         CurrentSprite->SpriteType = PartType;
00181         strcpy(CurrentSprite->SpriteName, SpriteName);
00182         CurrentSprite->Created = 1;
00183 
00184         return CurrentSprite;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*************************************************************************/
00195 /*************************************************************************/
00196 void DrawSprite(struct Sprite *CurrentSprite)
00197 {
00198         //Calculate the offset difference between frames
00199         float offsetDiffX = 1.0f / CurrentSprite->NumWidthFrames;
00200         float offsetDiffY = 1.0f / CurrentSprite->NumHeightFrames;
00201         float offsetX = 0.0f;
00202         float offsetY = 0.0f;
00203         //Set draw mode to texture
00204         AEGfxSetRenderMode(AE_GFX_RM_TEXTURE);
00205         // Set position for the sprite drawing
00206         AEGfxSetPosition(CurrentSprite->Position.x, CurrentSprite->Position.y);
00207 
00208         // Update the transparency of the sprite if visible or not
00209         if(CurrentSprite->Visible == FALSE)
00210         {
00211                 AEGfxSetTransparency(0.0f);
00212         }
00213         else
00214         {
00215                 AEGfxSetTransparency(CurrentSprite->Alpha);
00216         }
00217         // Update the current frame on the animation
00218         if(CurrentSprite->AnimationActive)
00219         {
00220                 // Updates to the next frame of animation if needed
00221                 CurrentSprite->AnimationTimer++;
00222                 if(CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame >= CurrentSprite->TotalFrames - 1 && CurrentSprite->AnimationTimer >= CurrentSprite->AnimationSpeed)
00223                 {
00224                         CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame = 0;
00225                         CurrentSprite->AnimationTimer = 0;
00226                 }
00227                 else if(CurrentSprite->AnimationTimer >= CurrentSprite->AnimationSpeed)
00228                 {
00229                         CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame++;
00230                         CurrentSprite->AnimationTimer = 0;
00231                 }
00232                 // Sets the correct offset after updating the animation frame
00233                 offsetX = ((CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame) % CurrentSprite->NumWidthFrames) * offsetDiffX;
00234                 offsetY = ((CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame) / CurrentSprite->NumWidthFrames) * offsetDiffY;
00235         }
00236         else
00237         {
00238                 // Sets the correct offset for the current frame
00239                 offsetX = ((CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame) % CurrentSprite->NumWidthFrames) * offsetDiffX;
00240                 offsetY = ((CurrentSprite->CurrentFrame) % CurrentSprite->NumHeightFrames) * offsetDiffY;
00241         }
00242         // Updates the rotation and mesh of the object to draw
00243         if (CurrentSprite->Rotation != CurrentSprite->RotationPrev || CurrentSprite->FlipX != CurrentSprite->FlipXPrev || CurrentSprite->FlipY != CurrentSprite->FlipYPrev)
00244         {
00245                 CurrentSprite->SpriteMesh = createMesh(CurrentSprite->Width * (((2*CurrentSprite->FlipX)-1)*-1), CurrentSprite->Height * (((2*CurrentSprite->FlipY)-1)*-1), CurrentSprite->OffsetX, CurrentSprite->OffsetY, CurrentSprite->Rotation);
00246                 CurrentSprite->RotationPrev = CurrentSprite->Rotation;
00247                 CurrentSprite->FlipXPrev = CurrentSprite->FlipX;
00248                 CurrentSprite->FlipYPrev = CurrentSprite->FlipY;
00249         }
00250         // Draws the texture on the mesh
00251         AEGfxTextureSet(CurrentSprite->SpriteTexture, offsetX, offsetY);
00252         // Draws the mesh
00253         AEGfxMeshDraw(CurrentSprite->SpriteMesh, AE_GFX_MDM_TRIANGLES);
00254 
00255 
00256         // Debug box, will be replaced
00257         if (CurrentSprite->CollideDebug)
00258         {
00259                 //Sprite Graphics Properties
00260                 AEGfxVertexList *DebugMesh = createMesh(CurrentSprite->CollideSize.x, CurrentSprite->CollideSize.y, 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00261                 AEGfxTexture *DebugTexture = AEGfxTextureLoad("TextureFiles/DebugBox.png");
00262 
00263                 AEGfxSetPosition(CurrentSprite->Position.x + CurrentSprite->CollideOffset.x, CurrentSprite->Position.y + CurrentSprite->CollideOffset.y);
00264 
00265                 AEGfxTextureSet(DebugTexture, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00266                 AEGfxMeshDraw(DebugMesh, AE_GFX_MDM_TRIANGLES);
00267 
00268                 AEGfxMeshFree(DebugMesh);
00269                 AEGfxTextureUnload(DebugTexture);
00270         }
00271 }
00272 
00273 /*************************************************************************/
00281 /*************************************************************************/
00282 void UpdateMesh(Sprite *currentSprite)
00283 {
00284         currentSprite->SpriteMesh = createMesh(currentSprite->Width, currentSprite->Height, currentSprite->OffsetX, currentSprite->OffsetY, currentSprite->Rotation);
00285 }
